EmailTemplate.subject: Palmetto
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.Name}
Many thanks for your interest in Palmetto Solar -
An Energy Specialist will contact you within 24 hours. In the meantime, please feel free to visit our website or call us at 855.339.1831
Interested in our discount or referral programs? Please ask our representatives!
Kind regards, The Palmetto Team
Palmetto™
701 East Bay Street, #413, Charleston, SC 29403 Main: 843-720-1844 Mobile: 843.860.6522 Palmetto.com
Leading the world towards a clean energy future.
Palmetto™ is a multinational clean energy company based out of Charleston, South Carolina. Palmetto™ is a vertically integrated finance, design, development, technology, construction and management company. Our sole purpose is to drive the world towards a clean energy future. Please visit our website(s) for more information.
This communication is sent by The Palmetto Group (“Palmetto”) or one of its affiliates. Palmetto™ has a Registered office at: 701 East Bay, Suite #413, Charleston, South Carolina, United States of America, 29403. More information on Palmetto™ is available at Palmetto.com Everything in this email and any attachments relating to the official business of Palmetto™ and any or all subsidiaries, ("the Company"), is proprietary to the Company. It is confidential, legally privileged and protected by relevant laws.
